dialogue.text: I should find the architect. Not for answers anymore, but to share what the questions became.

visual_elements.journey_quality: Retracing familiar path with new energy

psychological_notes: Full circle momentâ€”Evan returns to where his healing journey began, but transformed. He no longer seeks answers but wants to share the transformation of questions themselves. This represents mature completion of therapeutic relationship.
philosophical_underpinning: Questions ripening into wisdom rather than resolving into answers
therapeutic_direction: Client ready to acknowledge growth and complete therapeutic arc
